item.description:
We are organizing a walk/run event, a fundraiser for CRY. Child Rights and You America is an independent, non-religious, non-political, 501(c)(3) registered non-profit organization in the United States. It works to restore basic rights to underprivileged children, especially from India.

CRY Walk for Child Rights is a platform for individuals to partner the child rights movement that enables lasting change in the lives of children. By simply walking / running in this event each individual in his or her own way will be restoring to children their basic rights to - learn, live, play, express and be protected.

For details on the local event please see the boston chapter page -
http://america.cry.org/cryevents/walk/crybostonwalkrun2012

Please come and support us and ofcourse bring as many friends and family!
item.name: CRY - 1K, 5K & 10K Walk/Run for Child Rights 2012
